96328.持ち前の 正義感の強さから 我が主は\n住民の失踪事件の 調査に乗り出した。\n:
With his natural sense of Justice, my Lord set out to investigate the disappearance of a resident. On a moonlit night a few days after
we began our investigation.

96329.放心状態の男がひとり リンジャーラの住む\n中央塔へ入っていくのを 見かけたのだ:
He saw a man in a comatose state entering the
center tower where Linjara lived. Lord decided
to follow him.

96330.男を追って着いたのは 中央塔の周辺に建つ\n５つの塔のひとつだった。\nそして:
We followed the man to one of the five towers
surrounding the center tower. And inside the
Tower, we saw an incredible sight.

96331.そこでは 異形の魔人が 男を…頭から……。\nその傍らには 表情の無いリンジャー:
There, a demon held a man from the head with an expressionless Linjara next to them. the Lord approached Linjara with a stern look
on his face.

96332.リンジャーラは 宝珠を闇に染め 魔人を召喚し\n強大なチカラを得たのだと 告げた:
Linjara told them that he had dyed his orb dark and summoned a Djinn of Power to give him great power. He said he needed this
power to make his country rich.

96333.主が 何か言おうとした瞬間 塔が大きく揺れた。\n私達があわてて外へと脱出すると:
Just as the Lord was about to say something, the towers shook violently. When we rushed out, countless demons were pouring out of the
five towers one after another...

96334.「ググ…… キ……キサマハ……\n グギャァアアアアアアアアアアッ！！: INTRUDER ALERT! GOING INTO KILL MODE!!
